formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SpeechActivateGrammar' =-
[Synopsis] Activate a Grammar
[Description] SpeechActivateGrammar(Grammar Name) This activates the specified grammar to be recognized by the engine. A grammar tells the speech recognition engine what to recognize, and how to portray it back to you in the dialplan. The grammar name is the only argument to this application.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,7 @@ Activate a Grammar
[Description] - SpeechActivateGrammar(Grammar Name) - This activates the specified grammar to be recognized by the engine. A grammar tells the speech recognition engine what to recognize, - and how to portray it back to you in the dialplan. The grammar name is the only argument to this application. + SpeechActivateGrammar(Grammar Name): + This activates the specified grammar to be recognized by the engine. + A grammar tells the speech recognition engine what to recognize, and how to portray it back to you + in the dialplan. The grammar name is the only argument to this application.
